moreBlocks.articles:
• Garden City Auto Accidents Lawyers
    We have helped hundreds of individuals and families maximize their recovery after a car, truck or motorcycle accident.
  • Garden City Construction Accident Attorneys
    With our extensive experience, knowledge and skill in construction accident claims, we can assist you in your quest to obtain the compensation you and your family deserve.
  • Garden City Work Related Accident Lawyers
    Since 1952, our family of personal injury lawyers has been helping families like yours that are affected by accidental injury, including workplace accidents and work-related accidents.
  • Garden City Bicycle and Pedestrian Accident Attorneys
    Our experienced attorneys and staff handle all matters related to injuries to pedestrian or bicyclists in collisions with cars, trucks, motorcycles or other motor vehicles.
  • Garden City Medical Malpractice Attorneys
    We have a solid track record of helping victims of medical malpractice and their families.

description:
At Sackstein Sackstein & Lee,LLP, we have been assisting personal injury accident victims throughout New York since 1952. Our law firm serves clients from locations in Garden City, Flushing, Brooklyn and the Bronx. We also assist clients in Queens and throughout New York City and the state.

Our personal injury practice includes claims related to car, truck and motorcycle accidents, premises liability (building, sidewalk and stairway accidents), work-related accidents (construction accidents, scaffolding and ladder accidents), medical malpractice and wrongful death. No matter what injuries you have sustained, our experienced lawyers will provide you with aggressive representation and unparalleled service.

The foundation of Sackstein Sackstein & Lee,LLP, is treating clients like family. We take our motto: "Our family helping your family for over 60 years" very seriously. And our attorneys have the knowledge, experience and confidence to go the extra mile for you. In fact, we have been successful in obtaining many multimillion-dollar recoveries for our clients. Our attorneys are also highly regarded by our peers. Eric B. Lee has been rated AV Preeminent* by Martindale-Hubbell in 2012 and 2013, and attorney Mark H. Sackstein has been named for inclusion in the 2013 New York Super Lawyers.

For help with your personal injury claim, contact our law firm today for a free initial consultation. We are available to clients 24/7 and make home and hospital visits. There is no fee unless we recover money for you. Besides English, Korean, Spanish, Chinese and Punjabi are spoken at our firm.

*AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories: legal ability and general ethical standards.
